description: McKay-Thompson series of class 12E for the Monster group.
comments: Given g.f. A(x), B(q) = q*A(q^2) satisfies 0 = f(B(q). B(q^2)) where f(u, v) = 12 + v^2 - 2*u^2 - u^2*v. - _Michael Somos_, Apr 21 2004
links: D. Ford, J. McKay and S. P. Norton, More on replicable functions, Commun. Algebra 22, No. 13, (1994), 5175-5193.
Index entries for McKay-Thompson series for Monster simple group
mathematica: QP = QPochhammer; A = O[q]^50; A = ((QP[q^2 + A]^2*QP[q^3 + A])/(QP[q + A]* QP[q^6 + A]^2))^2; s = A - 3*(q/A); CoefficientList[s, q] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 13 2015, adapted from PARI *)
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x^2 * O(x^n); A = ((eta(x^2 + A)^2 * eta(x^3 + A)) / (eta(x + A) * eta(x^6 + A)^2))^2; polcoeff( A - 3*x / A, n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Apr 21 2004 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 27 2000
